execution_plan.description: Find receipt numbers that include at least one item matching 'cake' and at least one item matching 'cookie' (case-insensitive, handles plural forms) from the items table.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT Receipt AS ReceiptNumber
FROM items
WHERE Item IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY Receipt
HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN LOWER(Item) LIKE '%cake%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0
   AND SUM(CASE WHEN LOWER(Item) LIKE '%cookie%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0;
